name: Mingamo Media
tag_list: san-jose-coupons, free--coupons, pizza-coupons, fund-raising, auto-repair-discounts, local-discounts, web-to-sms, mobile-coupons
overview:
Mingamo Media offers online coupons that can be printed individually, printed in groups, or sent to mobile phones via sms.

Mingamo is unique in the local market in that it raises funds for high school athletic programs. In turn, the high schools promote the Mingamo website and coupons at school events, on school grounds, through social networks and other fundraising events.

Local business benefits because they have low cost advertising opportunity to connect to a large growing local consumer base. Plans start at $240 for 3 months. Advertisers recieve a digital coupon builder, one page profile page, and the ability to post multiple coupons with unlimited changes.

Consumers benefit because they can receive discounts at the local stores and establishments they visit on a weekly basis.
